send(byte[]) - Method in class SocketController
Tries to send the passed message through the current connection Sends the message to the remote peer.

Closes the currently connected socket and sets the status of the program to CLIENTMODE

Closes the currently connected socket and sets the status of the program to SERVERMODE

Starts listening to incoming connections Blocks the current Thread until a successful connection has been established or an Exception occurred.
